metadata.title: CVE-2024-43443 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input done by an attacker with admin privileges('Cross-site Scripting') in Process Management modules of OTRS and ((OTRS))Community Edition allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) within the ProcessManagement targeting other admins.This issue affects:  *  OTRS from 7.0.X through 7.0.50  *  OTRS 8.0.X  *  OTRS 2023.X  *  OTRS from 2024.X through 2024.5.X  *  ((OTRS)) Community Edition: 6.0.xProducts based on the ((OTRS)) Community Edition also very likely to beaffected

criterions.comment: znuny package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
